Summary: UFO or something flew into clouds and not even 2 seconds later thunderstorms.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Moundsville
There were no other sightings in Moundsville on or around July 16th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsi was on my back deck turning off my pool and was looking at the sky cause it was supposed to rain.. Im not gonna try and guess how far away but not very far at all in the sky i saw an all silver shiny either cigar or disc shape ufo fly straight into a cloud and disapear..It made no noise and was close enough that if it was a small plane or helicopter i should have been able to see the blades or hear it..It moved very slow..It could not have been a jet cause there was no jet trail or whatever its called....whole thing lasted about a min or so until it went into clouds it started to pour down rain and thunderstorm soon as it went into clouds
